title: Colorado mountains to see dangerous avalanche conditions, officials say
description: An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorado’s Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
content:
An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorados Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
The Colorado Avalanche Informa… [+1585 chars]
de: In den Bergen Colorados herrscht gefährliche Lawinengefahr, sagen Beamte. Es wird erwartet, dass ein aufkommender Schneesturm an diesem Wochenende gefährliche Lawinenbedingungen in den Park-, Gore- und Front Range-Bergen Colorados auslösen wird, sagten Staatsbeamte.
en: Colorado mountains to see dangerous avalanche conditions, officials say. An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorado’s Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
la: Montes Colorado videre condiciones periculosas avalanche, magistratus dicunt. Tempestas nivis advenientis expectatur ut condiciones avalanche periculosas per Colorado's Park, Gore et Front Range montes in hac weekend, officiales civitatis dixerunt.

title: Winter Storm Warning As 20 Inches of Snow To Hit: 'Avalanche Danger'
description: Residents in certain areas have been warned that the heavy snowfall could result in whiteout conditions and a risk of avalanches.
content:
Residents in certain areas have been warned that the heavy snowfall could result in whiteout conditions and a risk of avalanches.
This story appeared on newsweek.com, 2025-12-10 09:29:26.
de: Warnung vor Wintersturm: 20 Zoll Schnee stehen bevor: „Lawinengefahr“. Anwohner in bestimmten Gebieten wurden gewarnt, dass der starke Schneefall zu Whiteout-Situationen und Lawinengefahr führen könnte.
en: Winter Storm Warning As 20 Inches of Snow To Hit: 'Avalanche Danger'. Residents in certain areas have been warned that the heavy snowfall could result in whiteout conditions and a risk of avalanches.
la: Hiems Tempestas Admonitio sicut XX unciae nivis ad percute: 'NIVIS Danger'. In quibusdam locis habitantes moniti sunt grave nix in condicionibus albis et periculo avalanches posse consequi.
